about_me: I am a passionate full-stack developer with a degree in Computer Science (Software Engineering) from Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, specializing in AI/ML applications, cloud computing, and scalable web development. I thrive on creating innovative solutions that integrate generative AI models to solve real-world challenges. With expertise in technologies like React, Django, TypeScript, and AWS, I am dedicated to building high-performance, secure, and user-centric applications. I am constantly driven by the opportunity to learn, grow, and push the boundaries of technology, aiming to deliver impactful solutions that make a difference in both the tech industry and the lives of users.

education.study: Bachelor of Computer Science (Software Engineering) with Honours

work_experience.company: ARMO - Asociația Română a Magazinelor Online

contribution.c1: Engineered and launched MONITORSCAPE, a regulatory monitoring and stakeholder management SaaS platform, using Python, Django, React, PostgreSQL, and AWS to deliver a scalable and performant solution.
contribution.c2: Integrated generative AI (via ChatGPT API) to automate legislative tracking by generating real-time summaries and categorizing legal documents, enhancing user experience and reducing data processing time by 75%.
contribution.c3: Built full-stack web applications that incorporated AI features for improved stakeholder engagement, including automated notifications, real-time dashboards, and interactive event management.
contribution.c4: Utilized AWS for deployment and scaling, ensuring high availability during high traffic peaks by managing containerized deployments with Docker.

project_experience.project: MONITORSCAPE: A Regulatory Monitoring and Stakeholder Management Platform (SaaS)
project_experience.tech_stack: React (Typescript), Python, PostgreSQL, Postman, Docker, AWS, Git, Ansible

contribution.c1: Developed a comprehensive web platform designed to streamline regulatory monitoring and stakeholder management for public affairs professionals.
contribution.c2: Engineered key features including automated bill tracking, real-time notifications, and a robust stakeholder management system.
contribution.c3: Utilized Python, Django, React, TypeScript, and AWS to build scalable, secure, and high-performance applications.
contribution.c4: Implemented automated data scraping from multiple government portals, reducing data collection time from hours to minutes and increasing efficiency in legislative tracking.
contribution.c5: Integrated AI-powered summaries using the ChatGPT API to categorize and summarize legislative initiatives, enhancing user experience with up-to-date information.
contribution.c6: Designed an intuitive user interface and incorporated stakeholder engagement tools, including email alerts, interactive dashboards, and event management features.

project_experience.project: Quickride: Development of Transportation Services Mobile Application for University Students

contribution.c1: Designed and developed a mobile application tailored to meet the transportation needs of university students, managing all phases from concept to deployment.
contribution.c2: Implemented essential features like ridesharing, real-time location tracking, and secure cashless payments, significantly improving user convenience and accessibility.
contribution.c3: Leveraged Firebase for robust data management and integrated Stripe for secure payment processing, showcasing expertise in modern mobile app development and cloud technologies.
contribution.c4: Optimized user experience by focusing on seamless navigation and intuitive interface design, resulting in a smooth and efficient ride-booking process for students.
